stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine End the run.
text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Viktor 1.0
